fields.title: Room 1: HTML Escape
fields.description: Welcome! Your first glitch is broken HTML.
fields.puzzle_question: What is the correct closing tag for an HTML paragraph?

fields.title: Room 2: CSS Confusion
fields.description: Colors are messed up. Fix it!
fields.puzzle_question: In CSS, what property changes the text color?

fields.title: Room 3: JS Madness
fields.description: Time to fix a broken JavaScript function!
fields.puzzle_question: In JavaScript, what keyword is used to declare a variable?

fields.title: Room 4: Python Problem
fields.description: The glitch spreads to Python scripts!
fields.puzzle_question: In Python, how do you print "Hello World"?

fields.title: Room 5: The Final Firewall
fields.puzzle_question: What HTTP status code means "Not Found"?
